albums.title: Pulse
albums.description: A live  album by the English progressive rock band originally released in 1995, on the label EMI in the United Kingdom.

albums.title: Dilate
albums.description: Her highest-selling and most acclaimed album, released in 1996.

albums.title: Axis Bold As Love
albums.description: Second studio album by the English-American band, released in 1967.

merch.description: We call this our mullet tee. It's simple in the front but all the party is on the back.
My eyes baby they're fixed on you in your snapback.
A cat patch that says 'Can't touch dis.' What more could you want in life?
